CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_obaby_article` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '公众号id', `articletypeid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '文章类别id', `title` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '文章标题', `desc` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '简述', `content` text NOT NULL COMMENT '文章内容', `img` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '文章缩略图', `author` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '文章作者', `addtime` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `scansum` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '点击量', `indexno` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '序号', `status` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `state` int(3) NOT NULL COMMENT '是否显示', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_obaby_articletype` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '公众号id', `title` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '分类标题', `desc` varchar(300) NOT NULL COMMENT '描述', `img` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '分类缩略图', `indexno` int(5) DEFAULT NULL, `state` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '是否显示', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
